Package ui.input.selection.layout

Class SelectableMinimumSizeSection<T extends SelectableResponsiveSection,​U extends T,​V extends T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.drawing.layout.DrawableResponsiveSection
        • ui.drawing.layout.MinimumSizeSection<T,​U,​V>
          • ui.input.selection.layout.SelectableMinimumSizeSection<T,​U,​V>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A common type between the two selectable sections.
    U - The type of the normal selectable section.
    V - The type of the selectable section shown when smaller than the minimum size.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResponsiveSection, PrintHandler, Section, ResizeHandler, SelectableResponsiveSection, SelectableSection, SelectionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinimumSize, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog
    public class SelectableMinimumSizeSection<T extends SelectableResponsiveSection,​U extends T,​V extends T>
extends MinimumSizeSection<T,​U,​V>
implements SelectableResponsiveSection
    A selectable minimum size section.
    Shows a different section if smaller than a certain size.
    A responsive section with a stored number of rows and columns.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SelectableMinimumSizeSection

        public SelectableMinimumSizeSection​(int rows,
                                    int columns,
                                    U section,
                                    V tooSmallSection,
                                    int minimumRows,
                                    int minimumColumns,
                                    TerminalHandler handler)
        Constructor for SelectableMinimumSizeSection.
        Parameters:
        rows - The initial number of rows in characters.
        columns - The initial number of columns in characters.
        section - The section to display if the minimum size is satisfied.
        tooSmallSection - The section to display if the minimum size is not satisfied.
        minimumRows - The minimum number of rows in characters.
        minimumColumns - The minimum number of columns in characters.
        handler - The TerminalHandler.

    • Method Detail

      • enabled

        public boolean enabled()
        Whether the section is enabled for selection or not. In this case pass through to the currently selected section.
        Specified by:
        enabled in interface SelectableSection
        Returns:
        Boolean; true if enabled.

      • setParent

        public void setParent​(SelectionHandler parent)
        Set the parent selection handler (meant to handle selection in a direction this section has no more options). In this case pass through to the currently selected section.
        Specified by:
        setParent in interface SelectableSection
        Parameters:
        parent - The new parent selection handler.

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(int rows,
                    int columns)
        Sets the size of the section in rows and columns of characters. In this case set the stored number of rows and columns. In this case set the size of the selected section too. Set the selected key handler to the newly selected section.
        Specified by:
        setSize in interface ResponsiveSection
        Overrides:
        setSize in class MinimumSizeSection<T extends SelectableResponsiveSection,​U extends T,​V extends T>
        Parameters:
        rows - The new number of rows.
        columns - The new number of columns.
